metadata.description: Norman is a typical eight-year old, living in a little old house with his zombie uncle. A fan of horror movies, he seeks to recreate his favorite scenes starring his heroes: Freddy Krugger, Jason Vorhees and Michael Myers. As his next victims, Norman chooses his classmates, the new boy, Jeremy, and the local rich girl, Grace. As they join the ranks of the local missing children, Norman has to work hard to avoid discovery...
metadata.name: Norman
